title: Championship Riven Figure Question: Still include code?
body:
Hello!
Does the championship riven skin still include the in-game code for the skin?
Date is November 28, 2016.
Thanks!

replies.body:
It does not include the Skin code anymore. It did during the release as part of a promotion for the new figure, but has since been removed as the promotion expired.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
